About

I want to be like David, a man after Gods own heart.
I want to be wise. To know when to be gentle and when to be mighty.
I want to be full of passion and still lead every thought captive.
I want to have abundance so that I may give abundantly. I want to do good unto all men, especially unto the household of faith.
I want to look at a person and see only the best.
I want to love, to be loved, to be in love, to have love, and to give love.
I want to marry my best friend. And
I want to be a friend to anyone who is in need of one.

I ♥ God

(And he ♥'s me too - it's a mutual thing.)

The best second best thing I ever did with my life was become a fellowlaborer for the 2007-2008 year. It's a leadership training program / mentoring experience and it had a tremendous positive impact on my life. I now have a much closer relationship with God and some practical experience that will be a springboard for the rest of my life.

The best thing I ever did with my life was marying Erin. More about her in a minute.

The basics

I am 23 years old. I was born in Georgia, but I've pretty much grown up in Ohio.

I earned two associates degrees from Sinclair CC, and I am curently working on a bachelors from the University of Cincinnati

Relationships

Besides being tight with God and having an amazing family, I have the sweetest, most amazingly wonderful wife I could imagine, Erin. She's the greatest thing since before sliced bread - fire and the wheel were the only two that even gave her a run for her money!

Take a look at NathanAndErin.com for a bit more of our life together.


Work

And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;

Colossians 3:23

I like to work. Most of my work is playing with computers, but I can enjoy sweeping a floor.

Even though I went to school for it, I am mostly self-taught when it comes to computers and web development. I can certainly thank iBoomerang for giving me the opportunity to grow and sharpen my skills. They were a great employer and I would recomend them to anyone looking for online marketing.

Play

I love live music. When it was avaliable, I was going to concerts every weekend.

I like being outdoors: hiking, camping, sports, basically anything. I'm not all that amazing at any sport but I still enjoy playing most of them.

I've pretty much pulled myself away from them, but I did enjoy lots of computer games.

I think, more than anything, I like spending time with friends.

Around the internet

I show up all over the place: facebook, myspace, twitter, Linked in, and pretty much anywhere where you see this duck:

That's all folks

Thanks for reading, I hope you have a great day!.

God bless,
-Nathan
